record.description: Market master collects fees for selling on the street. The market was allowed by the city council in the early days and the fee set at 25 cents remains the same. But he was collecting $1.00 though not when he saw me and my camera.
record.source: Archival Photographic Files. Addenda. Mildred Mead Photographs
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Curling. Photographer stamp, handwritten date and caption.
